mapper.insert: insert into apps_trx_type(trx_name, trx_group, activity_type, created_by, created_on, updated_by, updated_on, version_status) values(#{trxName}, #{trxGroup}, #{activityType}, #{createdBy}, #{createdOn}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedOn}, #{versionStatus})
mapper.update: update apps_trx_type set trx_name = #{trxName}, trx_group = #{trxGroup}, activity_type = #{activityType}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, updated_on = #{updatedOn}, version_status = #{versionStatus} where id=#{id}
mapper.sql: att.id as id, att.trx_name as trxName, att.trx_group as trxGroup, att.activity_type as activityType, att.created_by as createdBy, att.created_on as createdOn, att.updated_by as updatedBy, att.updated_on as updatedOn, ud.user_name as createdByDisplay, ud1.user_name as updatedByDisplay, ld.lookup_desc as trxGroupDisplay
